snippet: The latest incident began Wednesday night and involved about 28 teenagers — some of whom had also escaped the Tennessee facility during a breakout on Monday.
lead_paragraph: The latest incident began Wednesday night and involved about 28 teenagers — some of whom had also escaped the Tennessee facility during a breakout on Monday.

headline.main: Disturbance Breaks Out at Nashville Detention Center
